agent
Class Agent

java.lang.Object
  agent.Agent

public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object

Agents have (at the moment) identifier, capital and budget. In addition, they have an identifier (like PAH, reseller etc) and a random id. Each agent has a buyer list, and a sellers' identifier list, ie the identifiers of agents it can sell/buy its products. Checks must be done during any Transaction, whenever a buyer is selling/buying from the right list.

Version:
0.1 Nov-09 created
Author:
EBMI

Method Detail

Launches

public boolean Launches(Product p,
                        java.util.UUID AgentID)
A seller launches a product to all the buyers associated with the product. The Product offers itself to its market, and if sold the seller increases the capital.

Parameters:
p - A product a Seller offers to a Buyer
AgentID - AgentID of the Seller, passed by EventManager.DoProcessing to increase his capital by Product.Price
Returns:
boolean
